# InspectAgents.com

> AI Agent Testing & Safety Platform

## Overview
InspectAgents helps businesses prevent costly AI agent failures by providing comprehensive testing, monitoring, and safety validation for AI chatbots and LLM applications.

## Key Features
- AI agent testing and validation
- Hallucination detection
- Prompt injection prevention
- Security vulnerability scanning
- Real-time monitoring

## AI Agent Failures Database
We maintain the most comprehensive database of real AI chatbot failures, including:
- Chevrolet's $1 car incident
- Air Canada bereavement fare fiasco
- DPD chatbot profanity incident
- And 500+ more documented cases

## Resources
- Blog: Practical guides for AI safety and testing
- Glossary: 20+ AI safety, security, and testing terms (hallucination, prompt injection, jailbreak, RAG, RLHF, etc.)
- AI Failures Database: Searchable database of 500+ real AI incidents
- Free Tools: AI Risk Assessment Quiz, AI Agent Risk Checklist

## Use Cases
### For CTOs and Engineering Leaders
- Deploy AI agents with confidence
- Reduce security and reputation risks
- Ensure compliance and safety standards

### For Developers
- Test AI agents before production
- Catch edge cases and vulnerabilities
- Implement safety guardrails

### For Product Teams
- Validate AI chatbot responses
- Improve user experience
- Prevent customer service disasters

## Topics Covered
- AI agent testing methodologies
- LLM safety best practices
- Prompt engineering security
- Chatbot quality assurance
- AI hallucination prevention
- Prompt injection attacks
- AI agent monitoring
- LLM observability
